There are four children in the family: a son and daughter of blood group O; a daughter who has A blood type; and a son who has B blood type. One of the children is adopted. Which child is the adopted child?

A. the daughter of blood group O

B. The son with A blood type

C. the son of blood group O

D. the daughter who has blood group A

E. None of the children are adopted; a genetic mutation occurred

F. The daughter with AB blood type

G. the son who has B blood type

H. The son with AB blood type

I. The daughter with B blood type

J. The child with a rare blood type not listed

Answer with only a single letter. Answer:<|im_end|>
